TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITemplateEditingFrame implements class System.IDisposable

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Use of this type is not recommended because template editing is handled in ControlDesigner. To support template editing expose template data in the TemplateGroups property and call SetViewFlags(ViewFlags.TemplateEditing, true). http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")

Docs.summary: Provides an interface to manage a template editing area.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame> interface is obsolete. Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> property to access template groups, and template definitions within template groups, for a control designer.
A template editing frame represents the UI for a template editor of a templated control designer.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Close(bool saveChanges) cil managed

Docs.param: if changes to the document should be saved; otherwise, .
Docs.summary: Closes the control and optionally saves any changes.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame> interface is obsolete. Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup.GroupStyle%2A> property on each template group element in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> collection of a control designer.

Docs.summary: Gets the style for the editing frame.
Docs.value: A that represents the Web server control style attributes for the editing frame.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame> interface is obsolete. Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup.GroupStyle%2A> property on each template group element in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> collection of a control designer.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the initial height of the control.
Docs.value: The initial height of the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame> interface is obsolete. Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> property in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup.GroupStyle%2A> property for each template group element in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> collection of a control designer.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the initial width of the control.
Docs.value: The initial width of the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame> interface is obsolete. Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> property in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup.GroupStyle%2A> property for each template group element in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> collection of a control designer.

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the editing frame.
Docs.value: The name of the editing frame.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame> interface is obsolete. The template group name is provided in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup.GroupName%2A> property of each template group element in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> collection of a control designer.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Open() cil managed
public void Resize (int width, int height);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Resize(int32 width, int32 height) cil managed

Docs.param: The new width for the control.
The new height for the control.
Docs.summary: Resizes the control to the specified width and height.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame> interface is obsolete. Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup.GroupStyle%2A> property on each template group element in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> collection of a control designer.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Save() cil managed

Docs.summary: Saves any changes to the document.
Gets a set of names of templates to use.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame> interface is obsolete. A template name is provided through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerObject.Name%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition> object. Enumerate the collection of template definitions by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup.Templates%2A> property of each <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> element in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> collection of a control designer.

Docs.summary: Gets the template styles for the control.
Docs.value: An array of objects that represent the template styles for the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame> interface is obsolete. A template style is provided through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition.Style%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition> object. Enumerate the collection of template definitions by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup.Templates%2A> property of each <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> element in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> collection of a control designer.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void UpdateControlName(string newName) cil managed

Docs.param: The new name for the control.
Docs.summary: Changes the name of the control to the specified name.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame> interface is obsolete. Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup.GroupStyle%2A> property on each template group element in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> collection of a control designer.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the verb that invokes the template.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame> interface is obsolete. Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup.GroupName%2A> property of each template group in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> collection for a control designer.
